transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Good evening, sir.
Executive: Good evening, ma'am.
Customer: Uh sir, actually reason ye hai ki maine mere ek buylead li thi aaj. Thik hai sir?
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Ek minute mai Krishna Shringar Kendra se baat kar rahi hu, Krishna se. Ha ha ha ha ji bataiye maine number pe call kar leti ma'am.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Actually sir is phone me aapka number feed nahi tha isiliye maine aapko us number pe call kiya. Sir Jalandhar ka customer hai ye buylead hai, inquiry nahi hai.
Executive: Achha thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai. Maine buylead li thi Rajat Gupta ke naam se hai. Jalandhar se hai sir bill banwa liya hai customer khud contact karta hai uske baad me wo bill banwa leta hai aur wo na unhe kam se kam unhe kitni baar un logo ko contact karo.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wo mujhe ek hi baat bol rahe hai madam aap na mai aapko thodi der me bata dunga. Maine kaha sir aap sirf itna bata do aapne maal lena hai ya nahi kyuki aapne maal nikalwa liya aur uski side se karwa liya. Thik hai? Agar aap wo maal nahi lenge to mai kisi aur customer ke sath contact karungi. Thik hai sir? Yehi hota hai na? Wo mere ko baar baar bol rahe hai madam aap ruko, madam aap ruko. Maine kaha sir aap yes or no bata do payment ka koi issue nahi hai aapko lena hai then thik hai nahi lena to thik hai. Sir wo continuously mujhe bewakoof bana rahe hai aur ab unka message aata hai nahi madam mujhe nahi lena. Matlab pura din kharab kara unhone mera pura din kharab kiya. Time waste kiya. Time important hai na sir? Time waste kiya aur last me ek hi baat bol rahe hai ki mujhe nahi lena. Jab unko pehle se mujhe pata hai pehle se unko nahi lena hoga lekin wo continuously bana to de kyuki unhe nahi lena.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: To aise customer ko mat entertain karo ma'am.
Executive: Uska solution kya hai agar customer.
Customer: Sir pata thodi hota hai aap is number ko ya to is customer ko block kar dijiye. Yehi kitna bada reason hai aaj hamara time waste kiya kal kisi aur dealer ka waste karega ye.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Thik hai unka details bhej dijiye ek baar.
Executive: Ha sir mai aapko unka detail bhej rahi hu. Gupta naam hai. Bhej dijiye aap inko block karwa dijiye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm hmm thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai. Aapko issue nahi hai na ma'am service me?
Executive: Nahi sir service me. Please ma'am mere number pe call kar liya kariye aapko koi dikkat nahi hai mai receive kar lunga kabhi bhi aap call karenge to.
Executive: Bas yehi dikkat thi na ma'am?
Customer: Sir service to aaj aa gayi na service me buylead li thi aur wo aise nikal gaye dekhiye kitna time gaya hoga sir.
Executive: Ha ha samajh raha hu.
Executive: Waise customer ko identify kar lijiye ha thik hai.
Executive: Ha ha thik hai identify kar lijiye.
Customer: Hmm. Ha baki sab sahi hai baki aap isko dekhiye sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wasted time due to indecisive buyer.

- Wants to block the customer's number.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to block the customer.

- Executive asked to call on his number.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, block, customer, time waste
